data.name: Tooltips_Crit_Tooltip
data.value:
affects the rate at which your attacks and heals can critically hit as well as the damage dealt and HP restored by a critical hit.
Critical Hit Rate and Damage increase by 0.1% approx. every

data.name: Tooltips_Next_Tier
data.value: point(s). To reach the next tier you need

data.name: Tooltips_Determination_Tooltip
data.value:
increases damage dealt by attacks as well as HP restored by healing actions.
Determination's effect increases by 0.1% approx. every

data.name: Tooltips_Direct_Hit_Tooltip
data.value:
affects the rate at which your attacks can direct hit. A direct hit increases damage done by 25%.
Direct Hit Rate increases by 0.1% approx. every

data.name: Tooltips_Skill_Spell_Speed_Tooltip
data.value:
shortens cast times and recast timers as well as increase damage done by damage over time effects.
A 2.5s GCD is sped up by 0.01s approx. every

data.name: Tooltips_Skill_Spell_Speed_DoT_Increase
data.value:
point(s).
DoT damage increases by 0.1% approx. every

data.name: Tooltips_Spell_Speed_GCD
data.value:
point(s).
A 2.8s GCD is sped up by 0.01s approx. every

data.name: Tooltips_Expected_Damage
data.value:
Average damage of a 100 potency skill, including critical and direct hits as well as passive traits such as Maim and Mend.
Damage is multiplied by Potency, Weapon Damage, Main Stat (Str/Int/Dex/Mnd) and all other damage modifiers (such as Direct Hit +25%, Brotherhood +5%) and always has a variance of ±5%.

data.name: Tooltips_Tenacity_Tooltip
data.value:
increases damage dealt and HP restored by your own actions as well as reducing damage taken.
Tenacity's effect increases by 0.1% approx. every

data.name: Tooltips_Piety_Tooltip
data.value:
increases the amount of MP gained per server tick (every 3s). By default you will gain 200 MP per tick.
Piety gives 1 extra MP approx. every

data.name: Tooltips_Defense_Tooltip
data.value: reduces physical damage taken by 1% approx. every

data.name: Tooltips_Magic_Defense_Tooltip
data.value: reduces magic damage taken by 1% approx. every

data.name: Tooltips_Main_Stat_Tooltip
data.value:
increases damage dealt as well as HP restored by your actions. An increase of 10% main stat constitutes a 10% increase in damage and healing.
SMNs physick is the only exception since it scales with MND instead of INT.

data.name: Config_Override_default_tooltips_tooltip
data.value: Override the default tooltips for all stats.

data.name: Config_Window_Use_Game_Language_Tooltip
data.value: Use the internal game language for this plugin if available. Currently Available: English, German
